ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 9 |  | #P_1lt4 | |- 1 < 4 |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 6 | #P_hlhilslem | |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` R ) ) |
